Free WiFi is available. Breakfast buffet is served from Monday to Friday in the spacious dining room. Guests can also enjoy a bar on site.

Description:
Hotel Ylläshumina is beautifully situated by Lake Äkäslompolo, near the village of Äkäslompolo. Guests have access to the excellent Ylläs ski slopes and a variety of hiking trails through the peaceful Lappish wilderness.

Each of Ylläshuminas apartments has a kitchen and their own private sauna, while cabin guests have access to the hotel sauna. Some guest rooms have a sleeping loft.

Whether you choose an apartment or a cabin, both provide a comfortable stay close to quality ski trails. All your needs are catered for via Hotel Ylläshuminas own ski school, waxing room and ski storage facilities.
